description:
This tests checks if the Coriolis and Centrifigual forces together with no inertial boundary conditions
are well implemented. It solves the flow in a 2D circle in a rotating frane of reference (angular velocity w)
and with a Dirichlet boundary condition u = -w x r on the wall. The exact linear solution is therefore
u = - w x r together with p = cst (here the constant is set to unity).
name: rotation2d
